works.description: A page on my website, titled "Dual and Two Tier Pricing in Thailand", has been substantially copied to multiple pages on the offending site. The copyrighted page begins with the text 'There are few subjects more divisive than that of dual pricing in Thailand and it is one of the practices most hated by foreign visitors and expatriates. It's a subject that's been done to death on forums and blogs. Some see it as outright racism, while others just accept it as being part of the landscape'
